channel.title: TorrIndex, World's First Magnet-Only Torrent Index
channel.description:
There has been a lot of talk about magnet links since The Pirate Bay decided to include them on their site recently. Various BitTorrent clients quickly added support for these type of links, and recently the first ‘magnet-only’ torrent index opened to the public.
[URL=http://torrentfreak.com/worlds-first-magnet-only-torrent-index-100116/]more[/URL] [img]http://torrentfreak.com/images/dlmagnet.jpg[/img] ps: i figured i'll start posting some P2P news here

item.title: TorrIndex, World's First Magnet-Only Torrent Index
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Teh Spede:

I thought torrent trackers disable dht on the torrent file when you upload it so you can have dht on on your client and it wouldn’t affect your private torrents?

no it doesnt work like that, DHT will allow users to find other users and get what they are downloading via their passkey (the system on which private trackers are based) so they can effectively get exclusive torrents without ever touching the site

Read full topic
item.source: TorrIndex, World's First Magnet-Only Torrent Index

item.title: TorrIndex, World's First Magnet-Only Torrent Index
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:7, topic:326050”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=422467.msg3102609#msg3102609 date=1263820269]
I read on TorrentFreak that it uses a DHT network type of thing, wouldn’t that fuck around with our private torrent sites since we have to disable those type of settings or b&?
[/quote]
Yeah, that’s pretty much it. IPTorrents and other similar sites would be pissed off if they caught anyone with PEX/DHT enabled.[/quote]
any priavte site would be

Read full topic
item.source: TorrIndex, World's First Magnet-Only Torrent Index

item.title: TorrIndex, World's First Magnet-Only Torrent Index
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Uriko:

I read on TorrentFreak that it uses a DHT network type of thing, wouldn’t that fuck around with our private torrent sites since we have to disable those type of settings or b&?

Yeah, that’s pretty much it. IPTorrents and other similar sites would be pissed off if they caught anyone with PEX/DHT enabled.

Read full topic

item.title: TorrIndex, World's First Magnet-Only Torrent Index
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:5, topic:326050”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=422467.msg3102397#msg3102397 date=1263800730]
Pretty sure a few months ago The Pirate Bay went ‘magnet-only’ (they no longer run a tracker), making this not the first.
[/quote]If i read correctly this is an indexer and not a tracker[/quote]Aside from what Spel said, they support both anyway as of now.

Read full topic
